title: App Configuration & Input Data Specifications
text: RDS file (data.frame) ported study_data element contains following required columns . site_code: character integer, identifier study site; integer, recommended add prefix “Site” display intuitively application’s UI subject_id: character, unique identifier subject event_repeat: integer, helps keep track unique event_id single subject_id event_date event_id: character, names help classify types event_names like-groups, generally characterized site visits. example, “SCR” screening visit, “VIS” Visit X (X integer), “EXIT” patient exits study trial. However, event_ids track events apply outside visit, like AE, ConMed, Medical History, etc. event_name: character, “event” generally characterizes sort site visit, whether “Screening”, “Visit X” (X integer), “Exit”, “Visit”. event_date: Date, date associated event_name form_id: character, unique identifier form item_name metric item_value pulled . Note: item_type continuous, form_id can contain several different item_groups. However, item_type ‘’, item_group can made several form_id values. form_repeat: integer, helps keep track unique item_names collected specific form_id given subject_id. form_repeat particularly helpful consolidating data like Adverse Events data format. Specifically, one AE collected patient, ’ll one form_repeat edit_date_time: datetime (POSIXct), last time record edited db_update_time: datetime (POSIXct), last time database storing record updated. region: character, describing region code site_code falls day: difftime number, meaning contains number unit time. measures number days visit screening vis_day: numeric, numeric representation day vis_num: numeric, numeric representation event_name event_label: character, abbreviation event_name item_name: character, describes metric parameter interest. item_type: character, classifies item_names either ‘continuous’ ‘’, continuous types generally associated CDISC “basic data structure” (BDS). , item_name metric collected time patient visit (event_name). ‘’ type represents non-time dependent measures, like demographic info, adverse events, Medications, medical history, etc. item_group: character, provides high level category groups like-item_names together. example, item_group = ‘Vital Signs’ group together pertinent item_name metrics like BMI, Pulse, Blood pressure, etc. item_value: character, measurement collected given item_name. value collected may number like 150 (collecting patient’s weight) word (‘white’ subject’s race). item_unit: character, tracking unit measurement item_name item_value. lower_lim: numeric, item_names (particularly ‘continuous’ type) pre-defined range values considered normal. lower limit range. upper_lim: numeric, item_names (particularly ‘continuous’ type) pre-defined range values considered normal. upper limit range. significance: character, either ‘CS’ means ‘Clinically Significant’ ‘NCS’ means ‘Clinically Significant’ reason_notdone: character, effort describe item_value field NA / missing.

title: App Configuration & Input Data Specifications
text: meta_data object list data.frames (surprisingly) contains metadata information application. provide study-specific settings, controls study data application visible. can created right format changing Excel template data-raw/metadata.xlsx, create metadata object functionget_metadata (e.g. meta <- clinsight::get_metadata("path--custom-metadata.xlsx")). meta_data object saved .rds file clinsight can use (e.g. saveRDS(meta, "data_folder/metadata.rds")). stated previously, metadata also used shape raw study_data right format, dictate variables included study_data. can done using function merge_meta_with_data(), described detail next section. goal , study-specific data captured metadata, leaving scripts run application largely unaltered studies. Just like study_data, package also bundles built-metadata object called metadata. view example metadata file, run following chunk code: Specifications list data.frames include: column_names: Used map raw data variable names new names. name_raw: character, variable name raw data source name_new: character, desired variable name use study_data application events: Used create simple timeline application, predefined number planned visits, N. contains following columns: event_number: integer. Example: 0, 1, 2, …, N event_name: character. Example: “Screening”, “Visit 1”, “Visit 2”, …, “Visit N” event_label: character. Example: “V0”, “V1”, “V2”, …, “VN” common_forms: Used select rename variables interest raw data transformed desired study_data format. Note: creating study_data data.frame use merge_meta_with_data() (surprisingly), metadata merged raw study data. common_forms contains columns : var: character, variable name display table, mapped known item_name provided study_data. Example: item_name = "AE Name" replaced “AE_AETERM” var = "AE_AETERM". suffix: Usually blank data.frame. column commonly used study_forms data.frame item_name: character, known item_names found study_data. certain item_names required, even missing study_data, including: “AE Name”, “AE start date”, “AE end date”, “AE date worsening”, “AE CTCAE severity”, “AE CTCAE severity worsening”, “Serious Adverse Event”, “SAE Start date”. item_type: character, known item_type corresponding found item_names study_data. item_group: character, known item_group corresponding found item_names study_data. study_forms: Contains columns data.frame common_forms, addition columns unit, lower_limit, upper_limit. Used select rename raw data variables interest. addition, suffix column used regularly “study” context. , variable names may consistent trunk / stem, varying suffixes describe similar style measurement. instead creating new row variables meta_data data.frame, allow inclusion several suffixes. example, VS_PULSE measures beats/min. Typically, measures collected using VS_PULSE_VSORRES & VS_PULSE_VSREAND, format, can list stem “VS_PULSE” var "VSORRES, VSREAND" suffix field. new columns, defined follows: unit: character, unit measure lower_limit: numeric, lower limit ’s considered clinically significant upper_limit: numeric, upper limit ’s considered clinically significant general: Contains columns common_forms used way. , ’s used select rename raw data transformed desired study_data format. Note: creating study_data data.frame use merge_meta_with_data() (surprisingly), metadata merged raw study data. Please refer common_forms spec . However, note certain item_names required, even missing study_data, including: “Age”, “Sex”, “ECOG”, “Eligible”, “.classification”, “DiscontinuationReason”, “DrugAdminDate”, “DrugAdminDose”. groups: Contains columns item_group, item_type, item_scale,use_unscaled_limits. table_names: Used renaming table column names readable format. required name column names; column names defined , raw name used instead. table_name: character, raw_name: character,

title: ClinSight
text: goal ClinSight provide consistent platform monitoring patient safety clinical trials. Shiny application clinsight package provides visualizations timelines simplify comparing multiple related data points within patients clinical trial. app highlights new/updated data shows clinical significance, reported responsible investigator/clinician, data point range. Furthermore, application contains query system audit trail option create PDF reports monitoring activities. application modular can customized specific studies using metadata Excel file, controls data shown tab/form application.

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. data_folder Character string. folder data resides usually set config.yml file. However, can overwritten path set argument. Useful testing purposes. credentials_pwd Character string credentials' database password. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See ?golem::get_golem_options details.

title: clinsight 0.1.1
text: Fixed inconsistencies app messages saving review form items different review states (items reviewed previously different reviewer, items completely new). Fixed bug clinsight deployed shinyproxy crash user non-ASCII letters name attempt login. new version, using shinyproxy deployment configuration, user name now expected base64 encoded, now base64 encoded clinsight default, app can also handle non-ASCII signs user names stored HTTP headers. display user name correctly, use base64 encoding application.yml ShinyProxy settings (example: http-headers.X_SP_USERNAME: "#{T(java.util.Base64).getEncoder().encodeToString(oidcUser.getFullName().getBytes())}").

title: clinsight 0.1.0
text: Improved metadata external file can used. Improved data loading using config file. Created two renv profiles, one development one production. Goal minimize package dependencies production version. Removed development package dependencies (example devtools) needed run application. Improved data anonymization. Changed license. Updated Description file. Improved reading data files within clinsight::run_app() Improved creating test result report. Added data specification run_app() documentation Improved function get_test_results(). Merged data now attribute ‘synch_time’ used update synchronization information side bar. user roles defined config.yml now shown several places application documented alongside user name needed. Provided scaffolding developers plan deploy Posit Connect Improved dataTable outputs Move shinymanager suggests since optional use . Add functionality mark forms required review . Improved required column verification metadata columns reading metadata using get_metadata(). Improved visibility queries, especially longer query text smaller screen resolutions. Adds option view query details full screen.
